content: {"name": "Iredell Christian Ministries", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Clients must register 30 minutes before closing to be able to shop in the pantry.  Those who arrive less than 30 minutes before closing will receive a box of food that was prepared in advance.", "email": "", "url": "http://iredellcm.org/home.html", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "752 Old Salisbury Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Statesville", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28677", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.7761529, "longitude": -80.8731052}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 924-6700", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}]}
